    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Terraform (–ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–∞–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å–æ state-—Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞–º–∏, remote –±—ç–∫–µ–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ —Å –ª–æ–∫–æ–º, –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å terraform_remote_state)

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Helm (–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ helmfile)

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Gitlab CI

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Hashicorp Vault (–∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å kubernetes, Auto-Unseal)

    • –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ Git (–∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ–±–µ–π–∑—ã, —Å–∫–≤–æ—à—ã)

    • –≠–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–π —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∫–æ–º–ø–µ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π –≤ –û–° Linux

    • –ê–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫ —Ö–æ—Ç—è –±—ã –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫, –¥–µ–º–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—è –≤ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è—Ö –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç–∏–∏ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π,

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—É—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã —Å –Ω—É–ª—è,

    • –û—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–Ω–æ –¢–ö –†–§, –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é ‚Äú–±–µ–ª–∞—è‚Äù –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞,

    • –¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∞ Apple,

    • –î–ú–°, –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∫–∏–¥–æ–∫,

    • –î–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞.


  204. Senior DevOps Engineer (C.T.Co/–õ–∞—Ç–≤–∏—è)
    ...any and team building events; Opportunity to work remotely from home (depending on project). Check out ou...

    C.T.Co Ltd. is a Europe-oriented IT solutions and services provider, based in Riga, Latvia (EU) with a track record of delivering enterprise solutions to top global clients for more than 20 years. C.T.Co employs over 600 people in Riga.

    We are looking for Senior DevOps Engineer who is ready to help various projects to launch and maintain their infrastructure and applications in Public Clouds. If you like to keep track on new technologies and implement them where they fit best, join us!

    Required experience in:

    • Cloud Platform configuration;
    • Build and Deployment automation;
    • Development Infrastructure Support;
    • CI and CD Pipeline configuration;
    • Unix server configuration;
    • Java or .Net application assistance and support during delivery stage;
    • Application Server configuration.

    Advantage Experience:

    • Containerization and Container orchestration Tools;
    • Build and Delivery automation for Mobile project;
    • Build and Deployment automation for Javascript, C# project;
    • Provision and Configuration Management Tools administration.

    Non-technical skills:

    • Team player;
    • Confidence and open for discussion with others;
    • Problem solving skills and attention to details;
    • Strong interpersonal and communication skills;
    • Motivation to grow and gain new knowledge;
    • Sufficient level in English reading/speaking/writing;
    • Good understanding of Russian.

    Responsibilities:

    • Public and Private Cloud Platform administration;
    • Kubernetes configuration and support;
    • Continuous Integration, Delivery or Deployment Pipelines setup;
    • Development Infrastructure Support (TeamCity, Git, Artifactory, SonarQube, etc.)
    • Automation of all kind of builds, tests executions, deliveries, deployments and information aggregation from all kind of tools and systems;
    • Follow Infrastructure as a Code principles.

    Benefits:

    • Advantage of working in a large, stable and reliable company, which managed to keep a dynamic and friendly work environment;
    • Experience in international projects for first-rate global companies;
    • Attractive salary and compensation package (advanced health insurance, flexible cell phone compensation, etc.);
    • Company sponsored professional trainings and certifications;
    • Active/passive participation in professional international conferences;
    • Career growth and opportunities for development;
    • Regular company and team building events;
    • Opportunity to work remotely from home (depending on project).

    Check out our website https://ctco.lv/


  205. Senior DevOps Engineer (Provectus/–û–¥–µ—Å—Å–∞)

    At Provectus, we are obsessed with technologies that impact the future of the whole of humanity. Just imagine: AI for curing eye diseases, ML for making factories safe for workers, preventing pandemic spreading etc. It's not about the future, it's about the products we've already developed with #ProvectusTeam.

    Join us if you have the same passion about making products using AI/ML technologies, cloud services, and data engineering.

    Join us if you value a friendly corporate environment, and almost a family-driven approach to every employee.

    Join us if you want to grow professionally and ready for learning new things constantly.

    As a DevOps Engineer you'll be provided with all opportunities for development and growth.

    About your first project within our company:

    Determine, a Corcentric company is a global provider of industry-leading cloud solutions that help organizations gain complete visibility into their data; turn it into valuable insights; and achieve total control to make more intelligent confident business decisions. Through end-to-end source-to-pay and contract management, our next-generation tools empower you to proactively eliminate risks, cut costs and save money.

    We are waiting for you to become a part of our team!

    Requirements:

    • Advanced Web server (e.g. Apache, Tomcat, IIS, etc.) admin & troubleshooting skills;
    • Strong scripting skills in automating standard tasks;
    • Python, Ruby, or Bash experience preferred;
    • Solid experience with AWS (VPC, EC2, ELB, RDS, IAM);
    • CI/CD configuration experience (Jenkins is preferred);
    • Experience with configuration management systems (Chef, Puppet, Ansible, etc);
    • Comfortable with Infrastructure as Code designs for automation of infrastructure builds and deployments;
    • Strong skills in Linux system administration and standard services (HTTPS, DNS, SMTP, NFS);
    • Proven experience with production systems and dealing with production issues;
    • Good level of knowledge of Oracle/PostgreSQL/MySQL DB engines;
    • Experience in troubleshooting and fixing various performance issues at the DB layer;
    • Experience in troubleshooting DB layer issues, recovery mechanisms, and backup/restore process with various tools;
    • Excellent knowledge of SQL, PL/SQL, and SQL optimization techniques.

    Responsibilities:

    • Creation of automation tools for dev/QA and prod/stage;
    • Building CI/CD flow from scratch, supporting and evolving it;
    • Taking responsibility for the DevOps culture across different projects;
    • Maintaining and improving configuration management/control systems;
    • Optimization of applications environment and continuous work on performance/availability improvements.

    We offer:

    • We offer you attractive professional and educational opportunities, a competitive salary, interesting technical projects, chances to engage with the latest technologies, and fun colleagues who make every online and offline event a treat.


  206. DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä (–ù–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏–∫ –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω-–∫—É—Ä—Å–∞) (Hexlet/–ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞)

    –•–µ–∫—Å–ª–µ—Ç ‚Äì –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω-–∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –ø–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é. –ú—ã –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ–º –Ω–æ–≤–∏—á–∫–∞–º —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Å—Ç–∞–º–∏, –∞ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω—ã–º —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞–º –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è :)

    –ù–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏–∫ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç –≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–∏: –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∏–∫–∞—é—â–∏–µ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –≤ —á–∞—Ç–∞—Ö, –¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—Å—è –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º, –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è–µ—Ç –¥–æ–º–∞—à–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è.

    –°—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –≤ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø–µ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ—Ç –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ 5 —á–∞—Å–∞–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏–∫–æ–º –≤ –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—é. –í –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø–µ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –±—ã—Ç—å –æ—Ç 15 –¥–æ 30 —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫.

    –ß—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º?

    • –°–æ–≤–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–æ–π: –≤—ã —Å–∞–º–∏ –≤—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞–µ—Ç–µ —É–¥–æ–±–Ω–æ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è;
    • –û–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –≤ –µ–≤—Ä–æ;
    • –ü–æ–ª–Ω—ã–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ –º–∞—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∞–ª–∞–º –•–µ–∫—Å–ª–µ—Ç–∞: —É—á–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∫–∞—á–∫–∞ soft skills: —Ü–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—Å—è –≤ –ª—é–±–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ;
    • –î–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ –±–∞–∑–µ —Å—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤: –ø–æ–¥–±–∏—Ä–∞–π—Ç–µ –∫ —Å–µ–±–µ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö Junior-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤.

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ–º?

    • –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º;
    • –í–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ ansible, terraform, docker (docker compose);
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è CI/CD;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –æ–±–ª–∞–∫–∞–º–∏ (aws, gcp, azure –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–º–∏);
    • –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫ https://guides.hexlet.io/check-list-of-engineering-practices/

    –û—Å–æ–±–æ —Ü–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—Å—è (–Ω–æ –Ω–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ):

    • –í—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏—è—Ö –∏ –º–∏—Ç–∞–ø–∞—Ö;
    • –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤ –æ–ø–µ–Ω—Å–æ—Ä—Å–µ, –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–µ —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤;

    –ß—Ç–æ –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏–∫?

    • –ü—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –≤ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø–µ (–ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –¥–∑, –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –≤ —á–∞—Ç–µ –∏ —Ç–¥);
    • –ö–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–µ—Å—Å —Å—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—é –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–∏;
    • –î–µ–ª–∏—Ç—Å—è –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º, –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è–º–∏, –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –º–∞—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∞–ª–∞–º–∏.


  207. DevOps (GCP) Engineer (DataArt/–°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥)
    ...á–∞—Å—ã), –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é —Å –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥...

    –û —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ

    DataArt –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è IT-–∫–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–æ–º –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –ü–û. –° 1997 –≥–æ–¥–∞ –º—ã –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º, –º–æ–¥–µ—Ä–Ω–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—é—Ç —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å—É –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤. DataArt –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞–ª—Å—è –∫–∞–∫ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥—Ä—É–∑–µ–π. –û—Ç—Å—é–¥–∞ ‚Äî –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—Å –æ—Ç –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö IT-–∞—É—Ç—Å–æ—Ä—Å–µ—Ä–æ–≤:

    ‚Äî –ü–ª–æ—Å–∫–∞—è —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞: –Ω–µ—Ç –ø—Ä—è–º—ã—Ö –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª—å–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∏ –ø–æ–¥—á–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö.

    ‚Äî –ú—ã –±–µ—Ä–µ–º –ª—é–¥–µ–π –Ω–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç, –∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é. –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –∑–∞–∫–æ–Ω—á–∏–ª–∞—Å—å, –≤—ã –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –≤ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –∏–ª–∏ –≤ –æ–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–π idle.

    ‚Äî –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –º–µ–Ω—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –∏–∑ –¥–æ–º–∞, –ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–µ–±—è –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–æ–ª—è—Ö.

    ‚Äî –ú–∏–Ω–∏–º—É–º –±—é—Ä–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏ –∏ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã.

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ Google Cloud.
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Compute Engine, Kubernetes Engine: –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏, —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–µ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è: Cloud Storage, Cloud SQL.
    • –¢–µ–æ—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ \ –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–µ–π OSI –∏–ª–∏ TCP\IP.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è (—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è, –ø–æ–¥—Å–µ—Ç–∏, —à–ª—é–∑—ã).
    • –ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã–º–∏ —É—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç–∞–º–∏ (traceroute, ping, nmap, nslookup).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å \ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è CI-—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º (Teamcity, Azure DevOps\TFS, Travis CI, Gitlab CI).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: git, tfvc, subversion).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–æ–≤ –∫ –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é –∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–¥–∞ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: gitflow).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–µ–ª—è—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–æ–≤–æ–º —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: C#, Java).
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–≤ —Å–±–æ—Ä–∫–∏ –∏ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.
    • –†–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: bash –∏–ª–∏ Powershell).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å App Engine.
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ ¬´–æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö¬ª –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–æ–≤ (HTTP(S), DNS, TCP, ICMP).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏–ª–∏ —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–µ —Ç–µ–æ—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–∏ continuous delivery\continuous deployment.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, –≤ —á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ Agile\Scrum.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ\–æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å nosql.
    • –ü—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–∞—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ë–î –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è—Ö.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ \ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π (Ansible, Chef, etc).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏–º–ø–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, GCP Cloud Deployment Manager).
    • –ù–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–æ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–º cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP).

    DATAART –ü–†–ï–î–õ–ê–ì–ê–ï–¢:

    • –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ:
      - –û–ø—ã—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∏ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è–º–∏.
      - –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –º–µ–Ω—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã, —Å—Ç–µ–∫, –ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–µ–±—è –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–æ–ª—è—Ö.
      - –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ 150 –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–≤–∞–ª–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏.
      - –ò–∑—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ: –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã, –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∞–º–∏ –∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∏–∑ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω.
      - –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥—á–∏–∫–æ–≤, –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—é—â–∏—Ö –Ω–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏—è—Ö –∏ –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∞—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤.
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–æ—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ: –æ—Ç—Å—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ –±—é—Ä–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏ –∏ –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã.
    • –î—Ä—É–∂–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –∞—Ç–º–æ—Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–∞, –∑–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –æ –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–µ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤.
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ (–µ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏—Å—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —á–∞—Å—ã), –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –ø–æ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é —Å –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–≥–∞–º–∏.
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –ª—é–±–æ–º –Ω–∞—à–µ–º —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏.


  208. DevOps Engineer (–†–û–°–ë–ê–ù–ö, Societe Generale Group (Russia)/–ù–∏–∂–Ω–∏–π –ù–æ–≤–≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥)

    –ü—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–∞–µ–º DevOps Engineer –ø—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∫ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –û—Ç–¥–µ–ª–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫ DevOps

    –í –†–û–°–ë–ê–ù–ö–ï –í–û–ó–ú–û–ñ–ï–ù –ü–û–õ–ù–û–°–¢–¨–Æ –î–ò–°–¢–ê–ù–¶–ò–û–ù–ù–´–ô –§–û–†–ú–ê–¢ –†–ê–ë–û–¢–´: –û–¢–ö–£–î–ê –†–ê–ë–û–¢–ê–¢–¨ - –†–ï–®–ê–¢–¨ –¢–û–õ–¨–ö–û –¢–ï–ë–ï! –ü—Ä–∏—Ö–æ–¥–∏ –∫ –Ω–∞–º, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞–¥ –∞–º–±–∏—Ü–∏–æ–∑–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∏ –Ω–∞—Å–ª–∞–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–æ–º –º–µ–∂–¥—É —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–æ–π –∏ –ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–π –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å—é!

    –†–æ—Å–±–∞–Ω–∫ ‚Äì —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –±–∞–Ω–∫ –≤ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–µ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–π —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤–æ–π –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã Societe Generale. –ú—ã –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 4 –º–ª–Ω –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ 70 —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–∞—Ö –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏. –†–æ—Å–±–∞–Ω–∫ –≤–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω –ë–∞–Ω–∫–æ–º –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –≤ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω—å 11 —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ –∑–Ω–∞—á–∏–º—ã—Ö –∫—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–π.

    –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

    • –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏, —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫ DevOps;
    • –í–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏ —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ DevOps;
    • –û–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º –∏ –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º DevOps;
    • –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫ DevOps –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ö (–ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö, —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω—ã—Ö, –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –¥—Ä.)
    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ SCM (Bitbucket, GitLab, Git);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (Jenkins, GitLab, Docker, DevOps Azure, ect);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Nexus Repository/Artifactory;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è–º–∏ (Ansible);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ (Zabbix, Prometheus);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (ELK Stack, Graylog, Syslog);
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ SQL –∏/–∏–ª–∏ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–∑ —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ (Bash, PowerShell, Python).
    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:
    • –°—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∑—Ä–∞—á–Ω—ã–π –¥–æ—Ö–æ–¥: –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏ –ø–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –æ–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–π –æ—Ç–ø—É—Å–∫;
    • –ó–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –æ –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—å–µ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤: –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ –î–ú–°, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—é –∏ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏ –≤—ã–µ–∑–¥–µ –∑–∞ —Ä—É–±–µ–∂, –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –∏ —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –∞–±–æ–Ω–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –≤ —Ñ–∏—Ç–Ω–µ—Å-–∫–ª—É–±—ã;
    • –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –æ–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –∑–∞ –±–æ–ª—å–Ω–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –ª–∏—Å—Ç: –¥–æ–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ —Å–≤–µ—Ä—Ö –ø–æ—Å–æ–±–∏—è –ø–æ –±–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω–∏ –¥–æ –æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–∞ (–¥–æ 5 —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏—Ö –¥–Ω–µ–π –≤ –≥–æ–¥);
    • –õ–∏—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç: –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –±–∏–±–ª–∏–æ—Ç–µ–∫–∞ –ê–ª—å–ø–∏–Ω–∞, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤, —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—è –≤ —Ä–µ–≥—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–µ—á–∞—Ö –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–ª—É–±–æ–≤ –∏ —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –æ–Ω-–ª–∞–π–Ω —à–∫–æ–ª;
    • –°–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∏–ª–µ–≥–∏–∏ –ø–æ –∫—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç–∞–º, –∏–ø–æ—Ç–µ–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –ª—å–≥–æ—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è—Ö, –ª—å–≥–æ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ç.–ø.;
    • –ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∫–∏–¥–æ–∫ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∏–ª–µ–≥–∏–π Primezone: —Ä–∞–∑–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ, –æ—Ç–¥—ã—Ö, —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä—ã –∏ —É—Å–ª—É–≥–∏, –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ;
    • –ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ –≤–æ–ª–æ–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏ –±–ª–∞–≥–æ—Ç–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏;
    • –°–æ–æ–±—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –ø–æ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–∞–º —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤.


  209. Hadoop DevOps Engineer (Multinational Financial Services) (DataArt/–õ—å–≤–æ–≤)
    ...ists; Flexible schedule and the ability to work remotely; The ability to work in any of our developmen...

    The client is one of the UK's leading investment firms. DataArt's specialists are supporting and developing their Big Data platform based on the Hadoop ecosystem.

    The Hadoop DevOps engineer will join the technical team on the client-side. The team of this project is dedicated to supporting the Hadoop platform. The project uses the Hadoop ecosystem, Kafka, and AWS.

    Note that we hire specialists not to the project, but to the DataArt. If the project is over, or you become uncomfortable in it, you can discuss a transition to another project.


    Required Skills and Experience:

    • 2+ years of experience in Hadoop administration
    • 2+ years of experience in Linux administration
    • Experience in scripting in Bash
    • Good spoken English


    Additional Competencies:

    • Experience in installing and maintaining Cloudera
    • Experience with Kafka
    • Experience with AWS
    • Experience in integrating Hadoop with ActiveDirectory
    • Understanding of the process and experience in production support and Hadoop performance optimization


    DataArt offers:

    • Professional Development:
      - Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
      - The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
      - More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
      - Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
      - Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.

    • The ability to focus on your work: a lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement, and convenient corporate services;

    • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;

    • Flexible schedule and the ability to work remotely;

    • The ability to work in any of our development centers.


  210. Devops Engineer (Soft-Werke/–°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥)

    Softwerke is looking for experienced DevOps engineers, who love their job and are able to analyse, design and implement end-to-end deployment pipelines. We offer interesting and highly perspective project job in international teams of one of the biggest German IT company leading in the sphere of R&D in Europe.

    Responsibilities:

    • Develop and support activities in the areas intelligent infrastructure automation and conÔ¨Åguration management
    • Automatization of application deployments and buildout of new systems in a SaaS / cloud environment like Google Cloud Platform (GCP) / Amazon Web Services (AWS) / Azure/ OpenStack
    • Implement and improve of continuous integration and continuous delivery pipelines
    • Working with the newest DevOps technologies and tools infrastructure automation, conÔ¨Åguration management, container technology, machine learning and AI

    Requirements:

    • University degree
    • 3+ years of experience working as a DevOps specialist
    • Orchestration tools: Ansible / Chef or Puppet
    • Programming skills: Ruby / Python/ Gradle, Bash / PowerShell scripts
    • Knowledge about Google Cloud Platform (GCP) / Amazon Web Services (AWS) / Azure / OpenStack
    • CI/CD tools: Jenkins / Travis CI / Concourse CI
    • Experience with GitHub or working in an agile development area using Jira
    • Upper-Intermediate English written and spoken

    Would be a plus:

    • Knowledge about MaxDB, HANA, Sybase and SAP R/3 / BOBJ / Hadoop
    • Experience in Kubernetes/Nomad/Docker Swarm

    We offer:

    • Interesting tasks in the area of web and mobile development
    • International projects
    • Small but stable and dynamically growing company (70+ employees, 15 years on the market)
    • Friendly working environment
    • 100% official enrollment, competitive salary and working conditions
    • Health insurance (incl. dental service)
    • Career paths
    • Working schedule flexibility and European management approach

    Conditions and compensation may be adjusted depending on interview results.


  211. –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä DevOps (ansible) (–†–µ–Ω–µ—Å—Å–∞–Ω—Å –ö—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç/–ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞)
    ...–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∞–ª –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–æ–º 24/7; –ù–∞—Å—ã—â–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è...

    PRO –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:
    • –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –ò–¢ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –±–∞–Ω–∫–∞: ansible;
    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç—ã –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ GitLab CI/CD –≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–∞—Ö –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏;
    • –í–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏.
    PRO —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ ansible –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–æ–ª–µ–π;
    • –ë–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Linux;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è pipeline-–Ω–æ–≤ GitLab CI/CD —Ä–∞–≤–Ω–æ –∫–∞–∫ –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –≥–¥–µ —Ç–∞–∫–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥—ã –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—è—é—Ç—Å—è;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏.

    –Ø–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏–µ—Å—è –ø—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º:

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ Atlassian (Confluence, Jira);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö —É—Å–ª—É–≥;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å AWX (Ansible Tower);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–æ–π (kubernetes –∏–ª–∏ openshift);
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Terraform;
    • –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è Python.
    PRO —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–æ–º —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–º –±–∞–Ω–∫–µ –∏–∑ –¢–û–ü-50;
    • –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ;
    • –î–ú–° (—Å 1-–≥–æ –º–µ—Å—è—Ü–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã);
    • –î–æ—Å—Ç–æ–π–Ω—ã–π –∏ —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –¥–æ—Ö–æ–¥ (–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥ + –±–æ–Ω—É—Å);
    • –ì—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã 5/2:
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ –≤ –¥–æ–±—Ä–æ–∂–µ–ª–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∞—Ç–º–æ—Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ;
    • –ê–º–±–∏—Ü–∏–æ–∑–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–≤–ª–∏—è—Ç—å –Ω–∞ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;
    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ: –∏–Ω–¥–∏–≤–∏–¥—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –∏ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä—ã –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∞; —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –±–∏–±–ª–∏–æ—Ç–µ–∫–∞; –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –æ–±—É—á–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –æ—á–Ω–æ (—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∏) –∏ –¥–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ (–≤–µ–±–∏–Ω–∞—Ä—ã, —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã); –ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∞–ª –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–æ–º 24/7;
    • –ù–∞—Å—ã—â–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å: —è—Ä–∫–∏–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤—ã, –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –¥–ª—è –¥–µ—Ç–µ–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤, –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏–±–∞–Ω–∫–æ–≤—Å–∫–∞—è –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç–∞, –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä—Å—ã, –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ—Ä–µ–≤–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;
    • –°–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å: –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π –≤–æ–ª–æ–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Å–∫–∏–π —Ç–µ–∞—Ç—Ä, —Å–±–æ—Ä —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ –¥–ª—è –º–∞–ª–æ–∑–∞—â–∏—â–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø –Ω–∞—Å–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å–Ω–∞—è –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å –¥–µ—Ç—Å–∫–∏–º –¥–æ–º–∞–º –∏ –¥–æ–º–∞–º –ø—Ä–µ—Å—Ç–∞—Ä–µ–ª—ã—Ö, –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ–¥–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–º —Å–µ–º—å—è–º, –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å –ø—Ä–∏—é—Ç–∞–º –¥–ª—è –∂–∏–≤–æ—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö, –¥–æ–Ω–æ—Ä—Å–∫–∏–µ –∞–∫—Ü–∏–∏;
    • –°–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏ –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å —Å —É—é—Ç–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∑–æ–Ω–∞–º–∏ –ø–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤.


  212. DevOps Engineer (–ê–∫—Ä–æ–Ω–∏—Å-–ò–Ω—Ñ–æ–∑–∞—â–∏—Ç–∞/–°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥)
    ...—Ä–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç—ã —Å —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å—é;...

    –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –ê–∫—Ä–æ–Ω–∏—Å-–ò–Ω—Ñ–æ–∑–∞—â–∏—Ç–∞ –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π –ü–û –¥–ª—è –∑–∞—â–∏—Ç—ã, —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Ä–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ø–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –≤–æ—Å—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö. –ù–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º DevOps Engineer, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—Ç—å –≤—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤—Å—é R&D –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∏–ª–∏–∞–ª–∞, –≤ –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –∫–ª–∞—É–¥–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç.

    –û–∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º–∏—Ç—å—Å—è —Å –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ, –ø–µ—Ä–µ–π–¥—è –ø–æ —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ: https://acronis-infoprotect.ru/

    –ß–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:

    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π –∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º —Å–±–æ—Ä–æ—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;

    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π –∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º CI/CD;

    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ Python/Go;

    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket;

    • –û—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞, –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;

    • –ü–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –¥–ª—è Acronis Backup, Acronis Backup Cloud, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure, Acronis True Image, Acronis Files Advanced –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∞.

    –ù–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —É–º–µ–Ω–∏—è:

    • –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ 3 –ª–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ —Å–±–æ—Ä–æ—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –ü–û;

    • –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ 3 –ª–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ CI;

    • –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ 3 –ª–µ—Ç –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ Jenkins, Artifactory, TeamCity;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux;

    • –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ Python, Bash;

    • –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ SDLC;

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π ‚Äì Scrum, Waterfall;

    • –û–±—â–∞—è –≥–∏–±–∫–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ ‚Äì —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –ø–æ–¥ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–æ —Å–ª–æ—è–º–∏ –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (Virtuozzo/OpenVZ);

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Redhat virtualization (oVirt);

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker/Kubernetes;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Atlassian applications;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Atlassian stack (Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence);

    • –ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –ë–î (Postgres, MySQL);

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ Upper-Intermediate.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    • –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∫ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤;

    • –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞, –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§;

    • –î–ú–° —Å –∫–ª–∏–Ω–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ VIP-–∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∞, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ –Ω–∞ –¥–µ—Ç–µ–π –¥–æ 18 –ª–µ—Ç;

    • –ö–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–∏—è;

    • –ß–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è —Ñ–∏—Ç–Ω–µ—Å–∞;

    • –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å;

    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —Å–º–µ—â–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è;

    • –†–∞—Å—Å–º–∞—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç—ã —Å —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å—é;

    • –°–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∞ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;

    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç –æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ –ê–ª—Ç—É—Ñ—å–µ–≤–æ –∏ –†–µ—á–Ω–æ–π –≤–æ–∫–∑–∞–ª;

    • –ü–∞—Ä–∫–æ–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ—Ä—Ä–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –ë–¶;

    • –†–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–∑ —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–æ–≤;

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è.


  213. Senior DevOps / Site Reliability Engineer (Joom/–ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) map[currency:RUR from:300000 gross:true to:]
    ...–≤—ã; –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã; –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç –∞–∫—Ü–∏–π –∫–æ–...

    Joom ‚Äî –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã–π –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –º–∞—Ä–∫–µ—Ç–ø–ª–µ–π—Å, —Å–∞–º—ã–π –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—É—â–∏–π e-Commerce —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –ï–≤—Ä–æ–ø—ã. –ü–µ—Ä–≤—É—é –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—é –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –º—ã –∑–∞–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏ –ª–µ—Ç–æ–º 2016-–≥–æ –≥–æ–¥–∞, –∫ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–º—É –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç—É –µ–≥–æ —Å–∫–∞—á–∞–ª–∏ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 400 –º–∏–ª–ª–∏–æ–Ω–æ–≤ —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫ —Å–æ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –º–∏—Ä–∞.

    –ù–∞—à–∏ –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç—É—Ç, –ø–æ—ç—Ç–æ–º—É –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞ ‚Äî –æ–¥–Ω–æ –∏–∑ –≤–∞–∂–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π. –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ SRE-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–∞–º–∏ –≤ AWS, —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ —Å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–º—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ –ø–æ–¥ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç—É—â–∏–µ –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏, –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ stateful —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏, —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º–∏ –∫–∞–∫ Mongo/Cassandra/Elastic, –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥–µ–ø–ª–æ–π –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–º –∏–∑ —Ç—ã—Å—è—á –º–∞—à–∏–Ω.

    –ó–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:

    • –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞, –¥–µ–ø–ª–æ–π–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞, —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π, –∞—É—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏;

    • —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã CI/CD –¥–ª—è –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á;

    • —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—å 100% Infrastructure as Code;

    • –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ —É–ª—É—á—à–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É Kubernetes –ø–æ –º–µ—Ä–µ –≤—ã—Ö–æ–¥–∞ –µ–≥–æ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ä–µ–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤.

    –¢–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏: Python, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Hashicorp Vault/Consul, MongoDB, Ansible, Kafka, Prometheus, Golang, Docker, AWS, networking, tcp/ip, linux/ubuntu, LDAP, Git, Jenkins, CI/CD, ELK Stack, Cassandra, Redis, FreeIPA, Kerberos.

    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:

    • —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Python –∏–ª–∏ Go –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã;

    • —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–µ–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π –≤–ø–ª–æ—Ç—å –¥–æ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π –∫–∞–∫ IPSEC, –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª—ã –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏;

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –ª—é–±–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–æ–π –¥–ª—è –¥–µ–ø–ª–æ—è –∏–ª–∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π: Ansible, Puppet, Chef, Terraform;

    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏: AWS/Azure/Google Cloud/OpenStack;

    • —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—è—Ç—å –Ω–µ–ø–æ–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏ –≤ unix –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è—Ö;

    • —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –¥–µ–∫–æ–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –∏ –¥–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –∏—Ö –¥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–∞.

    –ü–ª—é—Å–æ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç:

    • –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ç–æ–≥–æ, –∫–∞–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç: AWS, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ansible, MongoDB;

    • –ø—Ä–æ–¥–≤–∏–Ω—É—Ç—ã–µ —Å–∫–∏–ª–ª—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã:

    • –∫—Ä–∞—Å–∏–≤—ã–π –∏ —É–¥–æ–±–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —Ä–∞–π–æ–Ω–µ –º. –î–∏–Ω–∞–º–æ/–ê—ç—Ä–æ–ø–æ—Ä—Ç/–¶–°–ö–ê/;

    • —Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç –¥–ª—è —Å–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π –Ω–µ –∏–∑ –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤—ã;

    • –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;

    • –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç –∞–∫—Ü–∏–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;

    • –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫;

    • –ª—é–±–æ–µ –æ–±–æ—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä;

    • –î–ú–°(–≤ —Ç.—á. –¥–ª—è –¥–µ—Ç–µ–π) –∏ 100% –æ–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–µ –±–æ–ª—å–Ω–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ;

    • –∏–ø–æ—Ç–µ—á–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –¥–≤—É—Ö –ª–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;

    • –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –æ–±–µ–¥—ã –∏ —É–∂–∏–Ω—ã –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ.


  214. DevOps Engineer (–ê–∫—Ä–æ–Ω–∏—Å-–ò–Ω—Ñ–æ–∑–∞—â–∏—Ç–∞/–ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞)
    ...—Ä–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç—ã —Å —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å—é;...

    –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –ê–∫—Ä–æ–Ω–∏—Å-–ò–Ω—Ñ–æ–∑–∞—â–∏—Ç–∞ –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π –ü–û –¥–ª—è –∑–∞—â–∏—Ç—ã, —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Ä–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ø–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –≤–æ—Å—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö. –ù–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º DevOps Engineer, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—Ç—å –≤—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤—Å—é R&D –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∏–ª–∏–∞–ª–∞, –≤ –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –∫–ª–∞—É–¥–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç.

    –ß–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:

    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π –∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º —Å–±–æ—Ä–æ—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;

    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π –∏ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º CI/CD;

    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ Python/Go;

    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket;

    • –û—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞, –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;

    • –ü–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –¥–ª—è Acronis Backup, Acronis Backup Cloud, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure, Acronis True Image, Acronis Files Advanced –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∞.

    –ù–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —É–º–µ–Ω–∏—è:

    • –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ 3 –ª–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ —Å–±–æ—Ä–æ—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –ü–û;

    • –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ 3 –ª–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ CI;

    • –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ 3 –ª–µ—Ç –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ Jenkins, Artifactory, TeamCity;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux;

    • –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤—ã—Ö —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤ Python, Bash;

    • –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ SDLC;

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π ‚Äì Scrum, Waterfall;

    • –û–±—â–∞—è –≥–∏–±–∫–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ ‚Äì —É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –ø–æ–¥ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–æ —Å–ª–æ—è–º–∏ –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (Virtuozzo/OpenVZ);

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Redhat virtualization (oVirt);

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker/Kubernetes;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Atlassian applications;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Atlassian stack (Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence);

    • –ë–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –ë–î (Postgres, MySQL);

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ Upper-Intermediate.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    • –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∫ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤;

    • –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞, –æ—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§;

    • –î–ú–° —Å –∫–ª–∏–Ω–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ VIP-–∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–∞, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ –Ω–∞ –¥–µ—Ç–µ–π –¥–æ 18 –ª–µ—Ç;

    • –ö–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–∏—è;

    • –ß–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è —Ñ–∏—Ç–Ω–µ—Å–∞;

    • –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å;

    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —Å–º–µ—â–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è;

    • –†–∞—Å—Å–º–∞—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç—ã —Å —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å—é;

    • –°–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∞ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;

    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç –æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ –ê–ª—Ç—É—Ñ—å–µ–≤–æ –∏ –†–µ—á–Ω–æ–π –≤–æ–∫–∑–∞–ª;

    • –ü–∞—Ä–∫–æ–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ—Ä—Ä–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –ë–¶;

    • –†–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç –¥–ª—è –∏–Ω–æ–≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–∏—Ö –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–æ–≤;

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è.


  215. IT DevOps Monitoring Engineer (Netcracker Technology Corp./–°–∞–º–∞—Ä–∞)
    ...Flexible working hours and an opportunity to work remotely....

    Since 1993, Netcracker Technology has been developing and implementing unique IT solutions for more than 250 customers worldwide, mostly telecom providers. We create dozens of innovative products and lead the global market of BSS/OSS solutions ready to be used in the cloud environment. Our comprehensive portfolio of software solutions and professional services enables large-scale digital transformations, unlocking the cloud's opportunities, virtualization, and the changing mobile ecosystem.

    We are looking for an IT DevOps Monitoring Engineer to be responsible for the operational oversight of the IT Monitoring Systems support and development

    Why join our team:

    • Work on design, development, and customization of mission-critical solutions to world-leading telecom companies;
    • Implement and support innovative technologies such as 5G, eSIM, Internet access by satellites in low Earth orbit, IoT, etc.;
    • Get unlimited opportunities for professional and career development in a global company.

    What you‚Äôll do:

    • Administering and developing of high-load monitoring systems (Icinga, Graphite/Clickhouse, Prometheus) and components;
    • Automation of monitoring with Ansible, organization of CI / CD processes;
    • Integration of systems with each other and with external services;
    • Research and implementation of new components in the monitoring stack;

    What we are looking for:

    • MSc degree (or equivalent) in Computer Science, Information Security, Applied Mathematics, or similar, or related practical experience;
    • Hands on experience in Linux (CentOS, RHEL) systems administration from 2+ years;
    • Experienced in writing bash/python scripts, understanding regular expressions;
    • Knowledge in any monitoring systems administration;
    • Knowledge in working with web servers (Apache, Nginx);
    • Log analysis / troubleshooting experience;
    • Understanding the principles of building and functioning of networks and network protocols;
    • General knowledge of the main components of the IT infrastructure, basic understanding of the structure of business processes in IT.

    Optional (will be a plus):

    • Experience working with Puppet, Ansible configuration management systems;
    • Experience with Git.
    • Experienced in working with databases (mysql, postgresql);
    • Understanding the principles of building high availability systems;

    We offer:

    • Competitive salary;
    • Career development opportunities;
    • Professional growth in the international business environment;
    • Medical insurance, covering dental services, online consultations with doctors,
    • More than 300 hard and soft-skills programs by the corporate career development center;
    • Open environment and encouraging knowledge sharing culture;
    • Free English courses and opportunity to practice foreign languages daily.
    • Flexible working hours and an opportunity to work remotely.


  216. –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–π –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä Linux (–†–æ—Å—Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º-–°–æ–ª–∞—Ä/–ù–∏–∂–Ω–∏–π –ù–æ–≤–≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥)
    ...µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è. –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–µ–Ω –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏–ª–∏ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π ...

    –†–æ—Å—Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º-–°–æ–ª–∞—Ä, –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã –ü–ê–û ¬´–†–æ—Å—Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º¬ª, ‚Äî –Ω–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–≤–∞–π–¥–µ—Ä —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π –¥–ª—è –∑–∞—â–∏—Ç—ã –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–æ–≤, —Ü–µ–ª–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é. –ú—ã –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–µ–º –∏ —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä—è–µ–º –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É ‚Äì —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å –≤ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö –≤ –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–µ –∏ —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–∞—Ö —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç —É–∂–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ 800 —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫, –∏ –º—ã –Ω–µ —Å–æ–±–∏—Ä–∞–µ–º—Å—è –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–≥–Ω—É—Ç–æ–º.

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–∞–µ–º –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–π –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä Linux –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É Solar JSOC - –¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∏–±–µ—Ä–∞—Ç–∞–∫–∏, –≤ –Ω–∞—à –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ –ù–∏–∂–Ω–µ–º –ù–æ–≤–≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–µ.

    –ß–µ–º –≤—ã –±—É–¥–µ—Ç–µ –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è?

    –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å Linux —Å —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–º —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ–º –ø–æ–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –≤–ø–ª–æ—Ç—å –¥–æ –≥–ª—É–±–æ–∫–æ–π –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏:

    1. –†–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã JSOC (–¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –∫–∏–±–µ—Ä–∞—Ç–∞–∫–∏) –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∏—Ä—É–µ–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏;

    2. –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –Ω–∞—à–µ–≥–æ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞:

    • –°–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏—Ö –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –º–µ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏–∑–º–æ–≤ –ø–æ–¥ Linux, –≤ –º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ–π –º–µ—Ä–µ –ø–æ–¥ Windows (powershell);
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –ø–æ–¥ Linux, –≤ –º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ–π –º–µ—Ä–µ –ø–æ–¥ Windows (powershell).

    3.–û–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–µ—Ä—ã–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –æ–∫–∞–∑–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ JSOC:

    • –ú–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ –∏ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–æ—Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã JSOC;
    • –ú–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ –∏ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ —Å –ó–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏; –°–≤–æ–µ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –≤–Ω–µ—Å–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π –≤ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã –∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏;
    • –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç –∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã JSOC;
    • –û—Ç—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ DRP –≤–æ –≤–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–µ; –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–µ–∫—Å–∞ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏–π –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–≤—Ä–∞—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∞–≤–∞—Ä–∏–π–Ω–æ–π —Å–∏—Ç—É–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ –±—É–¥—É—â–µ–º.

    4. –ü–æ–º–æ–∂–µ–º —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–∏ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö DevOps-–ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞—Ö - CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è, –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è, –ø—É–±–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –æ–±–ª–∞–∫–∞.

    –ß—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–∏–≥–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è –≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ?

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è Linux –∏–ª–∏ Windows —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –æ—Ç 1 –≥–æ–¥–∞;
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏/–¥–∏–∞–≥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏/—É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–µ–ø–æ–ª–∞–¥–æ–∫ —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ (Zabbix), Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, Git, Active Directory, Remote Desktop Services, IPsec, grafana, etc.
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∏ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ OS: RHEL, CentOS, Debian, Windows Server (–≤ –º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ–π —Å—Ç–µ–ø–µ–Ω–∏), –°–£–ë–î MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è SQL –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ yaml —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤, regexp, –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –∞–ª–≥–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–¥–∞ (–º—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º —Å–≤–æ–π –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–π –∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏–∑–º—ã), bash/php/perl/python etc.
    • –ü–ª—é—Å–æ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Docker, Puppet, Ansible, Chef –∏ –¥—Ä.,
    • –ü–ª—é—Å–æ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –æ–ø—ã—Ç –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ CI/CD –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ (Jenkins+ GitLab CI).

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º?

    • –ó–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –ø–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, –µ–∂–µ–∫–≤–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏ –∑–∞ —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –∏ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç;
    • –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ, "–±–µ–ª–∞—è" –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏;
    • –°–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç: –î–ú–° (+–≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç—å —Ä–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤), –¥–æ–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –±–æ–ª—å–Ω–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–æ 100% –æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–∞ - 28 –¥–Ω–µ–π –≤ –≥–æ–¥—É, —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ 50% –Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–µ—Ç –†–æ—Å—Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º –∏ TV, –Ω–∞–±–æ—Ä —Å–∫–∏–¥–æ–∫ –æ—Ç –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (—Ñ–∏—Ç–Ω–µ—Å, –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–∏—è –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–º –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ), 10 –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–ø–ª–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º—ã—Ö sick leave days –≤ –≥–æ–¥, –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–º –±–∏–±–ª–∏–æ—Ç–µ–∫–∞–º –∏–∑–¥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤ –ê–ª—å–ø–∏–Ω–∞ –∏ –ú–ò–§ —Å —Å–æ—Ç–Ω—è–º–∏ –∫–Ω–∏–≥, –º–∞—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å –∫ –≤–∞–∂–Ω—ã–º —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏—è–º –≤ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏, –≤ –ø–µ—Ä–∏–æ–¥ –ø–∞–Ω–¥–µ–º–∏–∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ –∫–æ–≤–∏–¥ –∑–∞ —Å—á–µ—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –¥—Ä.;
    • –í–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–µ–µ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–µ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ–º–æ–º—É –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–∏—é –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞–¥ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥–æ–≤—ã–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–º —Å –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –≤ —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ –∫–∏–±–µ—Ä–±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏;
    • –ì—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: 5/2, —Å –≥–∏–±–∫–∏–º –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è. –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–µ–Ω –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏–ª–∏ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –°–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å –∑–æ–Ω–æ–π –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ—Ç–¥—ã—Ö–∞ (–Ω–∞—Å—Ç–æ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Ç–µ–Ω–Ω–∏—Å, —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∞–∂–µ—Ä—ã, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–æ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Ñ—É—Ç–±–æ–ª), –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —à–∞–≥–æ–≤–æ–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –æ—Ç –¢–†–ö –ò–ù–î–ò–ì–û LIFE.


  217. DevOps Specialist (–†–¢ –ú–ò–°/–ö–∞–ª–∏–Ω–∏–Ω–≥—Ä–∞–¥)

    ¬´–†–¢ –ú–ò–°¬ª - –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∞—è IT-–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∑–¥—Ä–∞–≤–æ–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—ã! –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–º–∏ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ–±–ª–µ–≥—á–∞—é—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤—É –≤—Ä–∞—á–µ–π –≤ –Ω–∞—à–µ–π —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ. –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤, —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω—ã—Ö –º—ã—Å–ª–∏—Ç—å –≥–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–¥—ã. –£ —Ç–µ–±—è –µ—Å—Ç—å —à–∞–Ω—Å –≤–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–µ –∏–º—è –≤ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—é —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∑–¥—Ä–∞–≤–æ–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—ã! –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π, –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∏—Ö –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º.


    –í —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º middle-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ –¥–ª—è –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –Ω–∞ –ø–æ–ª–Ω—É—é –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å, –¥–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞.
    –£ –Ω–∞—Å –Ω–∞ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–µ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 30 –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Å—Ç–∞–ª–ª—è—Ü–∏–π –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–∞—Ö, –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –æ–±—ä–µ–º –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–π –∏–∑ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –æ–∫–æ–ª–æ 20-30 –í–ú.
    –†–∞–∑–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –æ—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è–µ–º –ª–∏–±–æ –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞–∫–µ –†–¢–ö (VmWare, –¶–û–î—ã –ø–æ –≤—Å–µ–π —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ), –ª–∏–±–æ –≤ —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –¶–û–î–∞—Ö –ó–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ (VmWare, HyperV, KVM, OpenStack –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ).

    –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º—ã–π –≤ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–µ (–ò–°) —Å—Ç–µ–∫ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π:
    - –í –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è –û–° Linux —Å–µ–º–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞ redhat (Centos 7-8, RedHat EE), –Ω–æ —Ç–∞–∫ –∂–µ –∏–º–µ—é—Ç—Å—è –∏–Ω—Å—Ç–∞–ª–ª—è—Ü–∏–∏ –Ω–∞ Windows Server, Astra Linux –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ
    - –ë–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫—É –æ—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è–µ–º —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é Nginx
    - Fastcgi –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ php-fpm
    - Java-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–º –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ–º –≤ tomcat
    - –ë—Ä–æ–∫–µ—Ä—ã –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥–µ–π (ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º Kafka –≤ dev-–µ)
    - –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–æ—Å–∏–º –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –∏ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ docker, —Ä—è–¥ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é docker-compose
    - –û—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç—å –∑–∞ —Å—á–µ—Ç —Å–≤—è–∑–∫–∏ pacemaker+corosync
    - ELK (—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–ª–∏—â–µ –º–µ—Ç–∞–¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –≤ –ò–°, —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω —Å–±–æ—Ä –ª–æ–≥–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π)
    - –ê —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ —Ä—è–¥ –≤—Å–ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ (bind, postfix –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ)
    - –ë–î PostgreSQL –ª–∏–±–æ MS SQL Server, —Å –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–æ–π –∏ —Ä–µ–ø–ª–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π (–Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å–º–µ–∂–Ω–æ–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –î–ë–ê)
    - –î–ª—è –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç—Å—è Zabbix (–≤—Å–ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ graphite)
    –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –≤—Å–µ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é ansible-–ø–ª–µ–π–±—É–∫–æ–≤, –¥–ª—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º terraform. –ß–∞—Å—Ç—å dev-—Å—Ç–µ–Ω–¥–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç–∞ –≤ Kubernetes, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –ø–æ–∫–∞ –¥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞ –Ω–µ –¥–æ–±—Ä–∞–ª—Å—è (–≤ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∞—Ö).

    –ß–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:

    • –†–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –ò–° (–æ—Ç –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –í–ú –¥–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—â–µ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã)
    • –ù–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –∏ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—è—Ç—å –æ—à–∏–±–∫–∏ –≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ –ò–° (–ø–æ –∏–Ω—Ü–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏–ª–∏ –æ–±—Ä–∞—â–µ–Ω–∏—è–º –æ—Ç –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π –ò–°)
    • –û—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è—Ç—å —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫—É —Ä–µ–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–Ω–æ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∞ —Ä–∞—Å–∫–∞—Ç–∫–∏
    • –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –¥–æ—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã CI/CD –∏ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –ò–°
    • –í–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –∏ –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ö —É—á–µ—Ç–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫ (BMC Remedy, Jira)
    • –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è—Ç—å –±–∞–∑—É –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª–∞ –≤ Confluence (–∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏–∏, –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è).

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –∂–¥–µ–º –æ—Ç —Å–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –û–° Linux –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –Ω–µ –Ω–∏–∂–µ LPIC-1
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∏–∑ –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ (—É–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ —á–∏—Ç–∞—Ç—å –ª–æ–≥–∏ –∏ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –≤ –Ω–∏—Ö –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—É—é –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞, –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫ –∏ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ –≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ü–û)
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–µ—Ç—è–º–∏ (–Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å–æ–≤, –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, —Å–±–æ—Ä –∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–≥–æ —Ç—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫–∞)

    –ü—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ–º –∏ –æ–¥–æ–±—Ä—è–µ–º:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ Zabbix (–Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —à–∞–±–ª–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–µ–π –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—å—è, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –º–∞–∫—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤, –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∫—Å–∏)
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤ Ansible (–Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ä–æ–ª–µ–π –¥–ª—è –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–∏–ø–æ–≤—ã—Ö –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π)
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ docker-–æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –≤–µ–±-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π (REST, SOAP, SPA)
    • –°—Ç—Ä–µ–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–∞—Ç—å —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–æ–≤ –∏ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π, –¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–¥–µ–∏ –ø–æ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏—é —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º.

    –í–∑–∞–º–µ–Ω —Ç—ã –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ—à—å:

    • –¶–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–µ–ø–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º –±–µ–∑ —Ç–æ—Ç–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∞—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω—ã —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–∞
    • –ü–æ–∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º–∏—à—å—Å—è —Å–æ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏–º–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å–Ω—ã–º–∏ IT-—Å–ø–µ—Ü–∞–º–∏
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Å–µ—â–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏ –∏–ª–∏ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞ –Ω–∏—Ö –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ —Å–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä–∞, –∏ –∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω–æ –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞—à—É –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—É –±–æ–ª–µ–µ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ–π –∏ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π

    • –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ –≤ —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–∏ —Å –¢–ö –†–§ —Å –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è

    • –ü–æ–ª–Ω—É—é –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å

    • –ö–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω—É—é –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—É

    • –ö–≤–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—ã–µ –±–æ–Ω—É—Å—ã

    • –î–ú–° + —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—é

    • –ö–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—é —Ñ–∏—Ç–Ω–µ—Å–∞.


  218. DevOps (GCP) Engineer (DataArt/–û–¥–µ—Å—Å–∞)
    ...alists; Flexible schedule and the ability to work remotely; The ability to work in any of our development ...

    DataArt is engaged in IT consulting and software development. Since 1997, we have been designing, developing, modernizing, and supporting solutions that help the businesses of our clients grow. DataArt started out as a company of friends and has a special culture that distinguishes it from other IT outsourcers, such as:

    - Flat structure. There are no ‚Äúbosses‚Äù and ‚Äúsubordinates‚Äù.
    - We hire people not to a project, but to the company. If the project (or your work in it) is over, you go to another project or to a paid ‚ÄúIdle‚Äù.
    - Flexible schedule, ability to change projects, to work from home, to try yourself in different roles.
    - Minimal bureaucracy and micromanagement, convenient corporate services.


    Required Skills and Experience:

    • Experience in automating administrative tasks
    • Experience in administering OS
    • Understanding the principles of building fault-tolerant systems
    • Experience in administering Google Cloud-based platforms
    • Skills in Compute Engine, Kubernetes Engine: Load Balancing, Networking
    • Experience with storage systems: Cloud Storage, Cloud SQL
    • Theoretical knowledge/experience in network administration
    • Understanding of OSI or TCP/IP models
    • Understanding of networking (static routing, subnets, gateways)
    • Basic skills in network utilities (traceroute, ping, nmap, nslookup)
    • Experience working with/administering CI systems (e.g. Teamcity, Azure DevOps/TFS, Travis CI, Gitlab CI)
    • Experience with version control systems (e.g. git, tfvc, subversion)
    • Knowledge of source code versioning approaches (e.g. gitflow)
    • Knowledge and experience with relational database administration
    • Basic knowledge of programming languages (e.g. C#, Java)
    • Knowledge of assembly methods and testing tools
    • Good spoken English


    Additional Competencies:

    • Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g. bash or Powershell)
    • App Engineer Experience
    • Understanding of the ‚Äúcore‚Äù protocols (HTTP(S), DNS, TCP, ICMP)
    • Experience with/theoretical understanding of building continuous delivery/continuous deployment
    • Knowledge of development methodologies, particularly with Agile/Scrum
    • Knowledge/experience with NoSQL
    • Understanding of how to use different databases in different conditions
    • Experience with orchestration/configuration management tools (Ansible, Chef, etc.)
    • Experience in implementing infrastructure as code (Terraform, GCP Cloud Deployment Manager)
    • Main cloud providers‚Äô certification (AWS, Azure, GCP)


    DataArt Offers:

    • Professional Development:
      - Experienced colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
      - The ability to switch projects, technology stacks, try yourself in different roles;
      - More than 150 workplaces for advanced training;
      - Study and practice of English: courses and communication with colleagues and clients from different countries;
      - Support of speakers who make presentations at conferences and meetings of technology communities.
    • The ability to focus on your work: a lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement, and convenient corporate services;
    • Friendly atmosphere, concern for the comfort of specialists;
    • Flexible schedule and the ability to work remotely;
    • The ability to work in any of our development centers.

    ANY.RUN - –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞.

    –ù–∞—à —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å - –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è –ø–µ—Å–æ—á–Ω–∏—Ü–∞ –¥–ª—è –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞ –ø–æ–¥–æ–∑—Ä–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∞.
    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç #1 –≤ –º–∏—Ä–µ, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–º –ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—Ç—Å—è —Å–∞–º—ã–µ –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: IBM, Canon, Hewlett-Packard, Renault, GAP, McAfee –∏ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö:)

    –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º DevOps-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞, –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞—é—â–µ–≥–æ –∑–∞ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞ 24/7.

    –í–∞—à–∏–º–∏ –∫–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã–º–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∞–º–∏ –±—É–¥—É—Ç:

    • –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞.
    • –û–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–µ–∞–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Ü–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç—ã.

    –ú—ã –∂–¥–µ–º –æ—Ç –≤–∞—Å:

    • –£–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Linux —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –≤ —Ä–æ–ª–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞/DevOps;
    • –ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ—à–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—É –≤ –ª—é–±–æ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è —Å—É—Ç–æ–∫;
    • –ì–ª—É–±–æ–∫–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ (—É –Ω–∞—Å Graylog, Grafana, Telegraf);
    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ –≤–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Ç —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã;
    • –¢–µ–ø–ª—ã–µ —á—É–≤—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∫ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º–æ–≥–æ –∏ –Ω–µ–∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º–æ–≥–æ.

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º –µ—Å–ª–∏ –≤—ã —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç–µ—Å—å –∞–¥–µ–ø—Ç–æ–º –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∞ Infrastructure as Code –∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä–∞–µ—Ç–µ—Å—å –æ–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–¥–æ–º –≤—Å–µ, —á—Ç–æ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ –æ—Ç —Å–ª—É—á–∞—è –∫ —Å–ª—É—á–∞—é –¥–µ–ª–∞—é—Ç —Ä—É–∫–∞–º–∏.

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –º–æ–∂–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å:

    • –ù–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤ —É–≤–ª–µ—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ - –≤–∞—à–µ –º–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç —É—Å–ª—ã—à–∞–Ω–æ, –∏ –≤–∞—à–∞ —Ä–æ–ª—å –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –≤–µ—Å–æ–º–æ–π;
    • –ö–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω—É—é –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—É, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –Ω–∞–ø—Ä—è–º—É—é –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç –≤–∞—à–∏—Ö —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π –∏ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ç –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –≤–∞–º–∏, –±–æ–Ω—É—Å—ã-–ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏ –ø–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –í—ã–±–æ—Ä —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –≤–∞—à–µ —É—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ: MacBook –∏–ª–∏ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ –∂–µ–ª–µ–∑–æ –¥–ª—è –∞–¥–µ–ø—Ç–æ–≤ Linux;
    • –ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—É —Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –∏–Ω–æ–≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–∏—Ö (–±–∏–ª–µ—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ –≤—Å—é —Å–µ–º—å—é –∏ –±–∞–≥–∞–∂ + 1 –º–µ—Å—è—Ü –∞—Ä–µ–Ω–¥—ã –∫–≤–∞—Ä—Ç–∏—Ä—ã);
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Å–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π –∏ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–∞ —Å—á—ë—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;
    • –û–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–º—É —è–∑—ã–∫—É –∑–∞ —Å—á–µ—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏;
    • –ö–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç –Ω–∞ —Ñ–∏—Ç–Ω–µ—Å –∏ —Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç;
    • –ê—Ç–º–æ—Å—Ñ–µ—Ä—É —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ø–∞ –±–µ–∑ –±—é—Ä–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏ –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–π –µ—Ä—É–Ω–¥—ã.

    –†–∞—Å—Å–º–∞—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∞–µ–º —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, —Å —Ä–µ–¥–∫–∏–º–∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞–º–∏ –≤ –£–ª—å—è–Ω–æ–≤—Å–∫.

    –° –Ω–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–ø–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∂–¥–µ–º –í–∞—Å –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ ANY.RUN


  220. Head of Devops (Paysend/–ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞)
    ...ial employment from the first day in the company; remote work or atmospheric office in the center of Mosco...

    Paysend is a FinTech company on a mission to change the way that people manage their money on a global scale.

    Our growth has been fast and exciting. We‚Äôve welcomed over 3 million customers and counting in the space of a few years, and we‚Äôve more than doubled in size since March 2020.

    Paysend‚Äôs success is built on supreme technology, friendly customer service and, of course, the very best talent in the FinTech industry. We‚Äôre looking for the future gamechangers of FinTech to join the team and to make a difference in the lives of millions around the world.

    Every day is a new challenge at Paysend, and we approach each project with ambition, innovation and creativity.

    What will you be doing in this role?

    • Manage the distributed team of Devops Engineers;
    • Work closely with engineering teams, QA engineers, system administrators, information security and monitoring teams.;
    • Build and enhance tooling used by the DevOps team
    • design and implementation automation tools for testing and deployment of products and environments
    • participation in new services design and implementation, participation in refactoring and redesign current solutions
    • Help creating easily repeatable patterns for local development to migrate to production
    • Hiring and onboarding new team members
    • Migrate all the project to the unified CI/CD
    • Build monitoring system for all our products.

    What you‚Äôll need experience in and what we‚Äôll be looking for:

    • Strong Understanding of CI/CD environments and how they facilitate the automation process with other orchestration tools.
    • Experience with Gitlab, Teamcity
    • Experience running monitoring and alerting systems( Zabbix, Prometheus, etc)
    • Experience with containerisation
    • Experience with Service Discovery
    • Good understanding of DB (mongo, postgres, oracle, ms sql)
    • Ability to lead a team of 10-12 engineers
    • Experience standardising the processes for several products
    • English at least Intermediate

    Benefits

    • professional growth in fintech;
    • official employment from the first day in the company;
    • remote work or atmospheric office in the center of Moscow (at your choice);
    • flexible schedule 5/2 (Saturday, Sunday and all holidays we have a rest);
    • tea, coffee, cookies in the office for a good mood;
    • loyal vacation system;
    • corporate English courses (entirely at the expense of the employer);
    • annual corporate events.

    Company Description:

    Paysend was born in April 2017 with the vision of creating money for the future. We were the first FinTech company to introduce a global card-to-card transfers, connecting 12 billion cards issued by the international payment systems Mastercard, Visa, China Union Pay and local cards schemes, and we have strategic partnerships with many of the world‚Äôs top payment companies. We help users send money to over 100 countries and have a 4.8/5 Trustpilot score. Paysend is one of the most popular and trusted digital money services in the world.

    Why Paysend?

    We‚Äôre looking for people who share our passion for innovation, buy into the Paysend ethos and add value to our team. When you join Paysend, you‚Äôll have the chance to grow and develop as the business does.

    We believe in empowering people to be successful in their jobs, and we pay them fairly for their expertise. We give everyone the context and tools to operate as business owners, and encourage our people to contribute with their hearts, minds and creativity.

    In the fast paced FinTech industry the Paysend journey may not always be easy, but we succeed by working together to create solutions that break the status quo. We employ the right people to help us steer the business towards success and global influence.

    If Paysend sounds like the perfect company for you, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!


  221. Specialist DevOps/Linux (ALP GROUP/–ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) map[currency:RUR from: gross:false to:280000]
    ...–≥–æ–¥–∞. –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏–∑ –¥–æ–º–∞ (–ø—Ä–∏ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—...

    ALP Group ‚Äî —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω–∞—è –ò–¢-–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è. –ù–∞—à–∏ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è: –ò–¢-–∞—É—Ç—Å–æ—Ä—Å–∏–Ω–≥ –¥–ª—è –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏–π, —Ç–æ—Ä–≥–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π; –ò–¢-–∞—É–¥–∏—Ç—ã; —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä; –∏–º–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–æ–∑–∞–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –ò–ö–¢.

    –ú—ã —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º —Å KFC, Adidas, Fischer Sports, Dior, Sunlight, Zenden, Zasport, ¬´–ò–Ω–≤–∏—Ç—Ä–æ¬ª, –∏ –µ—â–µ 105 –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è–º–∏.

    –ù–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –æ –Ω–∞—Å:

    1. –ö–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ - 100 —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫.
    2. –í —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ–º –º—ã —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–µ–º –Ω–∞ 15% –≤ –≥–æ–¥.
    3. –°—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–∏–π –≤–æ–∑—Ä–∞—Å—Ç –ò–¢-—Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ ‚Äì 30 –ª–µ—Ç, —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π ‚Äì 33 –≥–æ–¥–∞.
    4. 90% –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—à–∏—Ö –∏ –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏—Ö —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–∏—Ö–æ–¥–∏–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ ¬´–æ–±—ã—á–Ω—ã–µ¬ª –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏.
    5. –° —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ –ø–æ–¥—Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π ‚Äì —Ç–∞ –∂–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è. –ù–∞–º –Ω—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è, –∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ –ª—é–¥–∏ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç—É—Ç –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–µ–π.

    –ï—Å–ª–∏ –í–∞–º —Ö–æ—á–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥–æ–π, –∂–∏–≤–æ–π, –¥—Ä—É–∂–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ, –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–µ—Å–∫—É—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ò–¢-–ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏, –∏–º–µ—Ç—å —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω—É—é –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤—ã—Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏ ‚Äì –º—ã –±—É–¥–µ–º —Ä–∞–¥—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç—å –í–∞–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É.

    –ß–µ–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è:

    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ CI/CD –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ GitLab.
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–≤ Kubernetes.
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ —Å–±–æ—Ä –º–µ—Ç—Ä–∏–∫ –¥–ª—è –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º —Å –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é.
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã—Ö –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–≤ PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, ElasticSearch.
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö –ø–æ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—é –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ —Å–≤–æ–±–æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ü–û.

    –î–ª—è –Ω–∞—Å –≤–∞–∂–Ω–æ:

    • –û–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–µ –Ω–∏–∂–µ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ –ò–¢ –æ—Ç 3 –ª–µ—Ç.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ Linux –æ—Ç 2 –ª–µ—Ç.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (KVM,VMware ESXi, Docker).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å PostgreSQL –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (—Ä–µ–ø–ª–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è, —Ä–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤–Ω–æ–µ –∫–æ–ø–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ).
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–æ–π —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è–º–∏ Ansible.
    • –í–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∞–º–∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ (Bash, Python).
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ Zabbix, Prometheus.
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –ª–∏—Ç–µ—Ä–∞—Ç—É—Ä—ã.

    –ñ–µ–ª–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ:

    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑–æ—É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤—ã–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ PostgreSQL, MySQL.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å RabbitMQ, ElasticSearch, Zabbix, Graylog.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ Nginx, Apache.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∫–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–≤ —Å –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–æ–π –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∏.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Ñ—Ä–µ–π–º–≤–æ—Ä–∫–æ–º –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–æ–ª–µ–π Ansible
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∏ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏ –∏ –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π (KVM, VMware ESXi, Docker, Kubernetes).
    • –ë–æ–Ω—É—Å–æ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –æ–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏—Ö –∏ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ Python.

    –ß—Ç–æ –º—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –†–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤—ã –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏ –∫–∞—Ä—å–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞.
    • –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏, –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã–µ –∏ —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–µ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç—ã.
    • –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤ –∏ –∫–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è —Ç—Ä—É–¥–∞.
    • –û–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è –∑–∞ —Å—á–µ—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏.
    • –î–ú–° –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ä–æ–∫–∞.
    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–∫–∏ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞.
    • –°–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —à–∞–≥–æ–≤–æ–π –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ —É–ª. 1905 –≥–æ–¥–∞.
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏–∑ –¥–æ–º–∞ (–ø—Ä–∏ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –æ–±–æ—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º).
    • –ì—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã 5/2 —Å 10-00 –¥–æ 19-00.
    • –û—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§.
    • –£—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ –∏—Ç–æ–≥–∞–º —Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è.


  222. AWS DevOps Engineer (Top Remote Talent/–ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) map[currency:USD from:4000 gross:true to:6000]
    ...An international fully remote product company with HQ Seattle is looking for an...

    An international fully remote product company with HQ Seattle is looking for an AWS DevOps Engineer.

    Responsibilities:

    • Deploy, manage, and operate scalable, highly available, secure, and fault-tolerant systems on AWS using IaC (infrastructure as code) approach
    • Participate in the on-call schedule
    • Anticipate operational problems by monitoring system performance and studying operating targets
    • Perform regular vulnerability scans and apply best security practices
    • Troubleshoot any emergency infrastructure incident to achieve optimal application performance and stability (on-call responsibility)
    • Estimate AWS usage costs and identifying operational cost control mechanisms
    • Collaborate with remote team members and stakeholders

    Requirements

    3+ years of experience as AWS operations engineer:

    • Background in deploying and managing enterprise solutions in AWS
    • Hands-on experience in AWS provisioning and good knowledge of AWS services like EC2, S3, CloudFront, ELB, RDS, EBS, Fargate, Lambda
    • Strong knowledge of networking concepts and AWS VPC features

    • Minimum 1 year of experience deploying container-based applications and managing hosts running Docker Swarm, Kubernetes, or Nomad
    • Experience with various database and storage solutions: AWS S3, MySQL, PostgreSQL, AWS Aurora, AWS, DynamoDB
    • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
    • Experience with IoC frameworks such Terraform or CloudFormation

    Nice-to-have

    • Saltstack experience
    • Python knowledge

    Working Conditions:

    • Work from anywhere;
    • 22 annual days off, with the ability to make up missed days on weekends;
    • Flex-time, aside from "required online hours" of 8-10am Pacific Time, work hours are fully flexible;
    • Ability to make up missed days on weekends;
    • Competitive salary based on experience and local cost of living;
    • Participation in quarterly profit-sharing after 1 year of employment: bonuses based on seniority and role;
    • Paid parental leave: up to 12 weeks of leave, 4 of which are paid.


  223. Senior DevOps Engineer (–î–∂–µ—Ç–†—É–±–∏ –≠–π–¥–∂–µ–Ω—Å–∏/–ù–æ–≤–æ—Å–∏–±–∏—Ä—Å–∫)
    ...æ –¥–Ω—è, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –¥–æ 5 –¥–Ω–µ–π –≤ –º–µ—Å—è—Ü. –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω...

    –ö–¢–û –ú–´?

    –•–æ—á–µ—à—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º–∏, –Ω–∞–¥ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π, –¥–æ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–π —Ä—ã–Ω–æ–∫ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –±—ã—Ç—å –¥–æ–π–¥–µ—Ç —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ 3-5 –ª–µ—Ç? –ò–ª–∏ —Ç—ã —Ö–æ—á–µ—à—å –±—ã—Ç—å —Ç–µ–º, –∫—Ç–æ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—è –Ω–∞–∫–æ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏? –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ, –∑–Ω–∞—á–∏—Ç —Ç–µ–±–µ –∫ –Ω–∞–º.

    –ù–∞—à–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –±—ã–ª–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∞ –∫–∞–∫ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ø Y Combinator. –ü–æ—ç—Ç–æ–º—É –Ω–∞—à–∞ –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞ –∏ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ –∫ –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ –ø–æ—Ö–æ–∂–∞ –Ω–∞ –∑–∞–ø–∞–¥–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã. –£ –Ω–∞—Å —Å–≤–æ–∏ —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–∏, —Å–≤–æ–∏ —Å–ª–æ–∂–∏–≤—à–∏–µ—Å—è –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª–∞.

    –ú—ã –≥–¥–µ-—Ç–æ –±—É–¥–µ–º —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ, —á–µ–º –æ–±—ã—á–Ω–æ. –ù–æ –∏ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏—á—å —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –º—ã —Ö–æ—Ç–∏–º —Ç–æ–∂–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ, —á–µ–º –æ–±—ã—á–Ω–æ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–≥–∞—é—Ç.

    –û—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä–µ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç –≤ 2018 –≥–æ–¥—É –∏ —É –Ω–∞—Å –∞–º–±–∏—Ü–∏–æ–∑–Ω—ã–µ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—ã —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è.

    –ü—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø—ã, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –º—ã –≤—ã—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ –∑–∞ —ç—Ç–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –ª–µ–∂–∞—Ç –≤ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ, —á—Ç–æ –º—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ–º –∏ –≤—Å–µ—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –º—ã –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ–º.

    –ù–∞—à–∞ —Ü–µ–ª—å - —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤, –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø—É—Ç—å, –±—ã—Ç—å —á–∞—Å—Ç—å—é –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã, –ø—Ä–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å–∏—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–∏ –∏–¥–µ–∏.

    –ü–æ—ç—Ç–æ–º—É –º—ã –∏—â–µ–º –ª—é–¥–µ–π, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —Ö–æ—Ç—è—Ç —á–µ–≥–æ-—Ç–æ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ–≥–æ, —á–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–¥; –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —Ö–æ—Ç—è—Ç —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å —á—Ç–æ-—Ç–æ, —á–µ–º –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –±—ã–ª–æ –±—ã –≥–æ—Ä–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è.

    –ß–¢–û –ù–ê–° –í–´–î–ï–õ–Ø–ï–¢ –ò –ü–û–ß–ï–ú–£ –°–¢–û–ò–¢ –†–ê–ë–û–¢–ê–¢–¨ –£ –ù–ê–°?

    1. –ú–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤. –° –Ω—É–ª—è. –ù–∞ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è—Ö.

    2. –û–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –∑–∞—Ä—É–±–µ–∂–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –∏ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ø–æ–≤ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä—è–º—É—é.

    3. –õ–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—ã —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è, –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —Ü–µ–ª–∏ –∏ –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è, —Ü–∏–∫–ª –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∏–¥–±–µ–∫–∞.

    4. –ü—Ä–æ–¥—É–º–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –∏ –≥–∏–±–∫–∞—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ –∏ —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∞ –æ—Ç —Å–∞–º–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ –¥–æ –≤—ã—Å–æ—á–∞–π—à–∏—Ö –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–π.

    5. –£ –Ω–∞—Å, —Å–æ–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Å–µ—Ä—å–µ–∑–Ω–æ, –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ç –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏.

    6. –í–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –º–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä –∫–ª–∞—Å—Å—ã –∏ –≤–æ—Ä–∫—à–æ–ø—ã.

    7. –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–∏ –ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö Open Source –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤.

    8. –î–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ –ø–æ–ø—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω—ã–º –ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–º –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–º —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–∞–º, –ø–æ–µ–∑–¥–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏.

    9. –ü–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥—ã –∫ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —É –Ω–∞—Å —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã –Ω–µ –Ω–∞ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞—Ö, –∞ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω—ã –≤ –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä—É. –£ –Ω–∞—Å –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫ –ª—é–¥—è–º –∏ —ç—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–∏—á–∏–Ω–∞ –ø–æ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π –ø—Ä–∏—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–µ, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –∑–Ω–∞–µ—Ç —Å–≤–æ–µ –¥–µ–ª–æ.

    10. –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –æ–±—Å—É–¥–∏—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–µ—à–∏—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∏–∫—à–∏–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã —Å —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–º –ª—é–±–æ–≥–æ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è –≤–ø–ª–æ—Ç—å –¥–æ –°–ï–û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, User Friendly –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥.

    –ù–ê–® –ò–î–ï–ê–õ–¨–ù–´–ô –ö–ê–ù–î–ò–î–ê–¢

    1. –í–ª–∞–¥–µ–µ—Ç –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–º —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–º –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ B2;

    2. –û–±–ª–∞–¥–∞–µ—Ç –≥–ª—É–±–æ–∫–∏–º –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º —Ü–∏–∫–ª–∞ CI/CD –∏ –Ω–∞–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –µ–≥–æ –∞—Ä—Ç–µ—Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤;

    3. –ò–º–µ–µ—Ç –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Bitbucket Pipelines –∏ CircleCI;

    4. –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø—ã –∏ –º–µ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏–∑–º–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã Docker;

    5. –ú–æ–∂–µ—Ç –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å Docker-–∞—Ä—Ç–µ—Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤—ã, —É–º–µ–µ—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —Å Docker multi-stage builds;

    6. –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ä–∫–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤;

    7. –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–æ –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–µ—Ç Kubernetes;
